item.description:
Hello Everyone,
Rajesh Jaiswal is hoping that we can give him some suggestions and ideas regarding his new venture. He needs fresh insights and straight-shooter comments from our members. I hope that you will be able to come and participate next week. I believe it will be worthwhile to come.
Thank you and we will see you there.
Best Regards,
Peter

Confidentiality agreement: Everything discussed in our meeting is confidential and should not be disclosed outside of the group by any member to other parties without the express consent of the individual member who shared his information with the group. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Small Business Group
item.name: Rajesh Jaiswal's New Business Venture
